info.title: Core Service
info.description: Core Service - Inventory, Order, and Billing Management Microservice

get.description:
Health check endpoint.

Returns service status and database connectivity.

post.description: Create a new inventory item

get.description: Get paginated list of items with optional filters

parameters.name: item_type

schema.description: Filter by item type (stock, non_stock, service, fixed_asset)
schema.title: Item Type

parameters.description: Filter by item type (stock, non_stock, service, fixed_asset)

get.description: Get item details by ID

post.description: Create a new item group

get.description: Get paginated list of item groups with optional filters

parameters.name: parent_id

schema.description: Filter by parent item group ID
schema.title: Parent Id

parameters.description: Filter by parent item group ID

get.description: Get item groups as a hierarchical tree structure

schema.title: Response Get Item Group Tree Api V1 Item Groups Tree Get

get.description: Get all active item groups in the organization as a flat list

schema.title: Response Get Active Item Groups Api V1 Item Groups Active Get

get.description: Get item group details by ID

parameters.name: force

schema.description: Force delete even if has children or items
schema.title: Force

parameters.description: Force delete even if has children or items

post.description: Create a new item price

get.description: Get paginated list of item prices with optional filters

post.description: Create multiple item prices in a single request

get.description: Get item price details by ID
Get all item prices for a specific item

schema.title: Response Get Item Prices By Item Api V1 Item Prices By Item  Item Id  Get

post.description:
Upload a file for bulk item import.

Supported formats: CSV, XLSX, JSON
Maximum file size: 50MB
Maximum rows: 10,000

Returns:
    Job information with status PENDING

get.description:
Get the status of a bulk import job.

Returns:
    Job details with current status

Get detailed error information for a failed import job.

Returns:
    List of errors with row numbers and details

schema.title: Response Get Import Job Errors Api V1 Bulk Import  Job Id  Errors Get

get.description:
List bulk import jobs for the current organization.

Returns:
    Paginated list of import jobs

Download a CSV import template with sample data.

Returns:
    File for download

Download an XLSX import template with sample data.

Returns:
    File for download

post.description:
Create a bulk export job for items.

Supported formats: csv, xlsx, json

Returns:
    Export job with status PENDING

get.description:
List bulk export jobs for the current organization.

Returns:
    Paginated list of export jobs

Get the status of a bulk export job.

Returns:
    Job details with current status

Download an exported file.

Returns:
    File stream for download

post.description:
Quick export items without creating a job.

Returns:
    Exported file stream

schema.title: Response Get Warehouse Tree Api V1 Warehouses Tree Get

get.description: Get warehouse details by ID

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by status (active, inactive, blocked). If not provided, returns all customers.

parameters.description: Filter by status (active, inactive, blocked). If not provided, returns all customers.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search in name, code, email, city

post.description: Create a new batch. Batch number must be unique per item.

get.description: List batches with pagination and filters.
Get batch by ID.

post.description: Create a new serial number. Serial must be unique per item.

get.description: List serial numbers with filters.
Get serial number by ID.
List history entries for a serial number.

schema.title: Response List Serial No History Api V1 Serial Numbers  Serial No Id  History Get

post.description: Add a history entry for a serial number (e.g. movement, sale).
Create a stock entry with optional line items.

get.description: List stock entries with filters.
Get stock entry by ID including line items.

post.description: Add a line item to a draft stock entry.

put.description: Update a line item in a draft stock entry.

delete.description: Remove a line item from a draft stock entry.

post.description: Create or upsert a stock level for an item in a warehouse.

get.description: List stock levels with filters.
Get stock level for an item in a warehouse. 404 if not found.

put.description: Update stock level for an item in a warehouse.

get.description: Get stock level by ID.

post.description: Record a stock movement (in, out, transfer, adjustment).

get.description: List stock movements with filters.
Get a stock movement by ID.

post.description: Create a stock reconciliation with optional line items.

get.description: List stock reconciliations with filters.
Get stock reconciliation by ID including line items.

post.description: Add a line item to a draft stock reconciliation.

put.description: Update a line item in a draft stock reconciliation.

delete.description: Remove a line item from a draft stock reconciliation.

get.description: Get stock settings for the current organization. 404 if not created yet.

put.description: Create or update stock settings for the current organization (upsert).

post.description: Create or overwrite stock settings for the current organization.
Create a put away rule.

get.description: List put away rules with filters.
Get put away rule by ID.

post.description: Create a quality inspection template. Requires quality_inspection.create.

get.description: List quality inspection templates. Requires quality_inspection.read.
Get template by ID. Requires quality_inspection.read.

post.description: Create a quality inspection. Requires quality_inspection.create.

get.description: List quality inspections. Requires quality_inspection.read.
Get inspection by ID. Requires quality_inspection.read.

post.description: Create pick list. Requires pick_list.create.

get.description: List pick lists. Requires pick_list.read.
Get pick list by ID. Requires pick_list.read.

post.description: Create delivery note. Requires delivery_note.create.

get.description: List delivery notes. Requires delivery_note.read.
Get delivery note by ID. Requires delivery_note.read.

post.description: Create purchase receipt. Requires purchase_receipt.create.

get.description: List purchase receipts. Requires purchase_receipt.read.
Get purchase receipt by ID. Requires purchase_receipt.read.

post.description: Create landed cost voucher. Requires landed_cost.create.

get.description: List landed cost vouchers. Requires landed_cost.read.
Get landed cost voucher by ID. Requires landed_cost.read.

put.description: Update landed cost voucher. Requires landed_cost.update.

delete.description: Delete landed cost voucher. Requires landed_cost.update.

post.description: Create invoice. Requires invoice.create.

get.description: List invoices. Requires invoice.read.
Get invoice by ID. Requires invoice.read.

post.description: Create payment. Requires payment.create.

get.description: List payments. Requires payment.read.
Get payment by ID. Requires payment.read.

put.description: Update payment. Requires payment.create (or add payment.update).

post.description: Create journal entry. Requires journal_entry.create.

get.description: List journal entries. Requires journal_entry.read.
Get journal entry by ID. Requires journal_entry.read.

post.description: Create quotation. Requires quotation.create.

get.description: List quotations. Requires quotation.read.
Get quotation by ID. Requires quotation.read.

post.description: Convert quotation to sales order. Requires quotation.update.
Create sales order. Requires sales_order.create.

get.description: List sales orders. Requires sales_order.read.
Get sales order by ID. Requires sales_order.read.

put.description: Update sales order status. Requires sales_order.update.

post.description: Convert sales order to invoice. Requires sales_order.update.

post.summary: Convert Sales Order To Delivery Note
post.description: Convert sales order to delivery note. Requires sales_order.update.
